entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Critical: .NET install domains and URLs are changing #336

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILDasm regression in relation to double (float64) and float (float32) values #111014
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting`: Application stop throws exception if host is still starting #111013
  • [Mono]Assertion at /runtime/src/mono/mono/mini/mini-runtime.c:417, condition `ptr' not met #111012
  • Test failure: profiler/handles/handles/handles.cmd #111008
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/explicitlayout/NestedStructs/case01/case01.cmd #111007

Closed

  • Location (highlighting) of IL2026 diagnostic could be improved #109823
    10.0.0
  • Support UpperCaseFirst enum value in CompareOptions #19462
  • Need APIs for unicode case mapping and case folding #20674
  • Propagate exceptions thrown in the Globalization managed callbacks #8032
  • Globalization API optimization opportunities #9975
  • Should JIT recognize and hoist NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo calls when parsing numbers? #11444
  • Incorrect behavior of SortedDictionary when used with OrdinalIgnoreCase comparer #29112
  • [RyuJIT/ARM32] low performance compared to amd64 investigation (System.Tests.Perf_Char.Char_ToUpper test). #13049
  • IndexOf and LastIndexOf are for some test cases few times slower on Linux #13676
  • [HttpListener] Failure in HttpListener.Start causes HttpListener get disposed automatically #37242
  • API proposal: safe extension methods for converting Span<T> to Span<U> for primitive integral types #31305

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix reporting GC fields from base types #111011
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Consolidate block pred iterator logic #111009
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up `fgReplaceJumpTarget` call sites #111006
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Warn on method access in Requires analyzers #110086
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • Fix conflicting HttpClient configs #110999
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • Unwrap NullableValue for diagnostics creation and add try/catch for formatting diagnostics #110229
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Add notes for NativeAOT specific warnings in ExpectedWarningAttributes #103657
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Warn on message formatting failure instead of crash, and fix Native AOT MakeGenericType failure #110330
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [Apple mobile] Enable trimming on build machines to match ILLink features #110966
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet watch reloading of razor class library CSS has regressed in 9.0 #45011
    9.0.2xx
  • dotnet watch file-watching has regressed in 9.0 #44912
    9.0.2xx

Updated

  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • xunit template #45645
  • Net5.0 RC2: When building a solution with a target runtime ID an error is given #14281
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • TheewarrlegendOG #45664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45636
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #45618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Surprising codegen for passing collection spread to span/readonlyspan taking method. #76488
  • IDE0200 (remove unnecessary lambda expression) can change semantics when capturing writable members #73259
    Backlog
  • Unclear error report when using uninitialized variable in a local function: "Use of possibly unassigned field '_dummyPrimitive'" #76586

PullRequests

Created

  • Rewrite unified settings test #76591
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Update telemetry to 17.13.28 (#76480) #76590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Extract method cleanup #76550
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Propagate marked attributes to synthesized fields. #76567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix crash when classifying embedded test classifications #76576
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • user-jwts cannot handle multiple claims with the same name #59671
  • Runtime exception for endpoints in different API versions with the same endpoint name #59669
  • error code: '00-00-00-00-00' #59668
  • Beta or stable release for SignalR-Client-Cpp #59665

Closed

  • HttpClient.GetFromJsonAsync<T> does not handle 204 returned by ASP.NET Core. #59670
  • Perf regression: mvc #59664
  • Perf regression: single_query #59666
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation #59663
  • Hot reloading fails after the second change of a razor file #59027
    9.0.x

PullRequests

Updated

  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Simplify PublicTopLevelProgramGenerator #59601
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Random app crashes on publish in AOT mode #26890
  • Custom Font Loading Issues with .NET 9 Maui Hybrid #26889
  • [Windows] `DropGestureRecognizer Drop` not called if `<WindowsPackageType>None</WindowsPackageType>` #26887
  • TimePicker Displays AM/PM Text in Different Languages with hh:mm tt Format on .NET 9 SDK (iOS Only) #26885
  • Talkback focus is not landing on Project work card when user closed the Project screen, instead focus is landing on Hamburger icon: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Screen reader. #26884
  • HybridWebViewHandler "VirtualView cannot be null here" #26883
  • Crash when CustomControl Property use StaticResource #26881
  • DisplayAlert() does not reflect Windows theme changes #26878
  • [MAUI]C1 - The iOS platform page cannot scroll to the bottom #26877
  • Getting started with ".NET MAUI Tutorial - Build your first multi-platform app in C#" #26875
  • Visual studio Output window told me to "Please log a bug" #26872

Closed

  • Maui net8 & net9 - Tab pages do not activate OnAppearing [Mac] #26499

PullRequests

Created

  • [Proposal] ScrollView inside a VerticalStackLayout #26891
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for MenuFlyoutItems programmatically added to MenuFlyoutSubItems are not visible #26886
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android / Windows] Fixed ListView.HasUnevenRows property run time changes #26882
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for TabbedPage more menu items color. #26876
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enable Catalyst UI Tests with Screenshot Verification - 2 #26874
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 65 #26873
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 62 #26805
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Tab Icon #26757
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed ListView items height are not proper in initial loading with HasUnevenRows set as True. #26841
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android & iOS] PopToRootAsync for modal pages - improvements #26851
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • [Windows] Fixed the exception when using CarouselView PeekAreaInsets Property in OnSizeAllocated method #26865
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Issues

Updated

PullRequests
